home.heading: HELLO, I AM GUSTAVO OLIVEIRA
home.sottoheading: I am a Full-Stack Developer in love with the continuous challenge, always seeking new creative solutions.

about.title: About
about.description: Hello, I'm Gustavo Oliveira, 22 years old. I was born in Brazil and i lived in Japan for 6 years, always accustomed to traveling and effectively restoring balance. A dynamic graduate in Finance, Marketing, and Administration. I am eager to venture into the professional world to enhance my skills. Throughout this life journey, i have developed a fervent passion for web development, wishing to apply what I have learned. Always passionate about the world of IT with the ability to work well both in a team and independently.

card1.testocard1: With GUZ Travel, your next adventure is just a click away. Developed with Angular and Java Spring, the platform allows users to easily explore and book exciting trips around the world.

card2.testocard2: Welcome to the big Medium Clone project! This project is a simplified clone of the popular content publishing site Medium.

card3.testocard3: Welcome to the Web Students project! This is a static page that provides information about students and courses related to various technologies.

card4.testocard4: This is a Spotify clone created using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. The goal is to recreate the Spotify experience in an enjoyable way.

card5.testocard5: Welcome to Epicode's Benchmark. Test your programming skills with our challenging questions. Hone your abilities and compete for the title of the best programmer!
